Première année Licence unifiée en Droit: First year Unified License in Law

Les quatre: The first four semesters are reserved for common modules relating to both public and private law. The options are mandatory
Le cinquième et le sixième semestre sont: The fifth and sixth semesters are reserved for specialization; It is within this framework that specific topics in private law are dealt with.
Précisons que le programme des six semes: It should be noted that the six-semester program complies with the recommendations of the Sectorial Law Commission.
présente un parcours: presents a course that students can choose following the second year of the Law Degree which, along with the first year, constitutes the common core of the Bachelor studies. This fundamental license in private law aims to provide students with the knowledge necessary to practice professions related to the field of private law or to continue their studies and specialize in domestic or international private law.
La Licence en droit privé: The License in Private Law allows students to apply for professional Masters and to take the various competitions that require the License in Law (Bar, Magistracy, Notary, legal consulting, ...).
FORMATION INITIALE, FORMATION CONTINUE,: INITIAL TRAINING, CONTINUING TRAINING, WORK-BASED TRAINING
Procédures civiles et voies d'exécution: Civil proceedings and means of execution
